dt-type.name: column-selector
dt-type.description: {integer} - column index (>=0 count from left, <0 count from right) "{integer}:visIdx" - visible column index (i.e. translate to column index) (>=0 count from left, <0 count from right) "{integer}:visible" - alias for {integer}:visIdx (>=0 count from left, <0 count from right) "{string}:name" - column name "{string}" - jQuery selector on column header nodes
